ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def OnCMD_REINICIALIZARFORMULASExecute(command, entity): command.RequestConfirmationBeforeExecute("Confirma a re-inicialização das fórmulas?");
def OnCMD_APAGARFORMULASExecute(command, entity): command.RequestConfirmationBeforeExecute("Confirma a exclusão das fórmulas?");
def OnCMD_INICIALIZARFORMULASExecute(command, entity): command.RequestConfirmationBeforeExecute("Confirma a inicialização das fórmulas?");
